body_content.explanation: a national park (= a large area of land protected by the government because of its natural beauty or because it has a special history) in the northeastern part of England:
examples: We were in the gift shop at the south end of the Northumberland National Park, near the town of Hexham.
We stop to take pictures of a section of the Roman construction known as Hadrian's Wall before driving through Northumberland National Park.
